title: AnswerNet, Leading Contact Center Provider, Completes SOC 2 Certification; AnswerNet, a leading contact center provider, is proud to announce its successful completion of the Service Organization Control (SOC) 2 Type II audit by I.S. Partners.
body:
PR Newswire

PHILADELPHIA, Feb. 18, 2019 /PRNewswire-PRWeb/ -- AnswerNet, a leading contact center provider, is proud to 
announce its successful completion of the Service Organization Control (SOC) 2 Type II audit by I.S. Partners. I.S. 
Partners is a globally recognized CPA firm that provides SOC audits and IT assurance services nationwide. The 
SOC 2 audit is designed to assure existing and prospective clients and other stakeholders that AnswerNet adheres 
to the standards set by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA) regarding data security.

The SOC 2 examination relies on the service organization designing and operating their controls to meet the Trust 
Services Principles of Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy. I.S. Partners 
examined AnswerNet for a period through 2018 and was able to assure AnswerNet's customer relationship 
solutions system for inbound, outbound, and automated call center solutions were protected.

"Our SOC 2 Type 2 certification demonstrates our dedication to ensuring the utmost secure contact center 
services," said Gary Pudles, CEO & President of AnswerNet. "In today's environment, we want our clients to feel 
confident with the security behind our system and service offerings."

The use and distribution of the AnswerNet SOC 2 audit report is restricted, however, a copy of our SOC 3 report 3 
is available for download athttps://answernet.com/soc/.

SOURCE AnswerNet
